RumorFact.Text: Solanum will try to get on the Vessel. Since Dark Bramble is sort of other dimension, can she reach it?

ExploreFact.Text: She did it! I don't know what is her power, but she is here and waiting for me again

Solanum have traced the coordinates of incoming Nomai messages. Canna, the modern Nomai, declares that there's a safe place in the <color=green>Gloaming Galaxy</color>. It's coordinates should be shown under the Vessel's bridge instead of the Eye signal hologram.
I found new coordinates to other Galaxy. We can use the Warp Core from Ash Twin Project to warp. There's no way back then. Am I ready to do this?
